summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Two Hundred and Twenty-five ($225.00) Dollars out of the General Fund to be paid to Y. Kayano and Fude Kanyano, in full settlement of their claim for damages against the city by reason for the flooding of their premises at No. 115 West Washington Street, by the breaking of a sewer at or near said premises, on the 13th day of October, 1906, and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
